### How to view the worksheet answers

The Computer Systems and Assembly Language worksheet answers are hidden
in the Google Doc style Heading 4. Follow these instructions to view
the hidden text.

1. Make a copy of the worksheet and save to your Google Drive.
![](../../assets/comp-org-assets/img/display-wksht-answers/display-wksht-answers-step1.png){fig-alt="Google Docs screenshot of file menu -> make a copy."}

1. Select some answer text.
![](../../assets/comp-org-assets/img/display-wksht-answers/display-wksht-answers-step2.png){fig-alt="Screenshot of selection of hidden white answer text."}

1. Change the text color.
![](../../assets/comp-org-assets/img/display-wksht-answers/display-wksht-answers-step3.png){fig-alt="Screenshot of text color selection."}
![](../../assets/comp-org-assets/img/display-wksht-answers/display-wksht-answers-step4.png){fig-alt="Screenshot of highlighted text changeed to pink."}

1. While the text is selected, change the color for Heading 4 by
   selecting `Update 'Heading 4' to match`.
![](../../assets/comp-org-assets/img/display-wksht-answers/display-wksht-answers-step5.png){fig-alt="Screenshot of heading selection menu -> Heading 4 -> Update 'Heading 4' to match."}

1. Now the answers are visible!
![](../../assets/comp-org-assets/img/display-wksht-answers/display-wksht-answers-step6.png){fig-alt="Screenshot of worksheet with previously hidden answers displayed in pink."}
